channel.title: Times of India
channel.description: The Times of India: Breaking news, views, reviews, cricket from across India

item.title: India's maiden Mars mission successful, Mangalyaan enters red planet's orbit
item.description: Isro's low-cost mission to Mars successfully entered the Red Planet's orbit, crowning India as the first country to execute such a project in its maiden attempt.

item.title: Narendra Modi congratulates Isro scientists, says 'MOM' never disappoints
item.description: History has been created today. We have dared, to reach out, into the unknown, Modi said congratulating the country over successful Mars mission.

item.title: Delhi zoo staff had 10 minutes to rescue youth killed by white tiger
item.description: Had more guards been around, Maqsood could have been prevented from crossing the barrier.

item.title: Govt curbs power of regulator to cap HIV, cancer drug prices
item.description: The move had triggered of a series of protests and lawsuits from the industry against the drug pricing regulator as they feared more such action.

item.title: Amazon limits delivery of goods above Rs 5,000 in UP
item.description: Including NCR areas like Noida and Ghaziabad
